name: Chocolate Chip Cookie
description: These cookies are decadent, chewy, and oh so delicious! Perfectly buttery and sweet.

name: Cupcake
description: This gourmet cupcake is filled with a creamy nougat center and topped with a delicious buttercream icing.

name: Strawberry Confetti Donut
description: Pair this tasty strawberry glazed donut with your favorite coffee or tea.

name: Croissant
description: Enjoy this crispy European delicacy straight from your home and feel like on a vacation in Paris.

name: Chocolate Milkshake
description: Delicious, creamy, and luscious chocolate shake!

name: Dark Roast Coffee
description: This full-bodied dark roast coffee has the bold and robust flavours to showcase our roasting artistry.

name: Earl Grey Tea
description: Essence of bergamot, a subtle citrus fruit, and a floral lavender note, are all essential to create this aromatically awesome tea flavor.
